page.title: 02THE GROBY FLYER.
page.content: Our local newspaper is the 'Groby Flyer'.It is published once a month and contains local news and views and is free. The June edition has an article about the Groby Fun Run and the Mini-Fun Run for under fives held the previous month.Another article featured fund raising for Action Aid, which is used to support a village in Somalia called Owr Boogeys.A local teacher made a parachute jump as part of the fund raising.There was also an article about how difficult it is to keep the churchyard tidy and free from weeds.There are news items about the four schools in Groby and interviews with the new headteachers of Brookvale High School and Elizabeth Woodville Primary School to get their views on education and to find out what hobbies and outside interests they have.
